timeline.message: Simple fix to remove the username from the repositoryURL

timeline.bodyText: We should not hardcode http:// here. It would be better to extract the schema from the repository url (if possible).
timeline.author: sleiss

timeline.bodyText: It's bad practice to invoke methods from the template. Due to change tracking those might be executed once every 10ms. Please only calculate this value once (e.g. as soon as the participation was loaded, save it in a variable adjustedRepositoryUrl in the component.ts and then directly use it here without a method
timeline.author: krusche
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -69,7 +69,7 @@
             ></jhi-programming-assessment-repo-export>
             <a
                 class="ml-2 mr-5"
-                href="{{ participation.repositoryUrl }}"
+                href="{{ adjustedRepositoryURL() }}"
